tool_description: Get Top News Globally, per Topic or Search Local News on Google News in Real-Time.
name: Real-Time News Data
title: Real-Time News Data

api_list.name: Topic Headlines
api_list.description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topics/* path part (e.g. Football Topic - `/topics/CAAqJQgKIh9DQkFTRVFvSUwyMHZNREoyZURRU0JXVnVMVWRDS0FBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

api_list.name: Language List
api_list.description: Get valid languages for a country code, to be used with all other APIs.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Country code of the country to get languages for. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).

api_list.name: Top Headlines
api_list.description: Get the latest news headlines/top stories for a country.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search news articles by query with an option to limit the results to a specific time range.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search query for which to get news.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: Domain of the source from which to return news articles (e.g. cnn.com).

optional_parameters.name: time_published
optional_parameters.description:
Find news articles published in a specific time range. 
**Default:** `anytime`

api_list.name: Local Headlines (Geo)

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Area, city or country to fetch news for (e.g. *London*).

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.

api_list.name: Topic News By Section
api_list.description: Get topic news article in a specific section.

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description:
Topic for which to get news headlines.

**Available topic**
- WORLD
- NATIONAL
- BUSINESS
- TECHNOLOGY
- ENTERTAINMENT
- SPORTS
- SCIENCE
- HEALTH

In addition, topic IDs are also accepted and can be taken from a News topic URL as it appears after the *topic/* path part (e.g. Football Topic - `/topics/CAAqJQgKIh9DQkFTRVFvSUwyMHZNREoyZURRU0JXVnVMVWRDS0FBUAE`)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default**: `en`.
